description: Unfortunately, when Hans, the delivery boy, arrives, he has no pizza! Carmen and Melinda threaten to call his boss and get him fired, unless he does EXACTLY as the mistresses demand. Hans is immediately made the object of intense whip training as blackmail to keep his job! Intimidated into being tied to his tail, he endures the hardest pain. The ladies also delight from tormentingly scratching his back, popping whips across his flesh, and seeing percussive instruments stirring up painful feelings in their target. Whimpering in pain after just his warm-up, there is no end in sight. A bullwhip is introduced, and just like a pizza when does when it burns, they make his ass go up in smoke! PIZZA DOMINA is highly recommended…FOR EVERY HUNGRY SLAVE!
title: THE WHIP LESSON 2 - PIZZA MAN
